items.title: Google invests in Fervo’s $462M round to unlock even more geothermal energy

items.title: CoreWeave CEO defends AI circular deals as ‘working together’
items.description: The CEO of the AI data center provider, which has Nvidia as an investor and a supplier, described the environment as a "violent change" in demand.
